roleset.name: experience wonder/awe

roles.note: Note that instances of "No wonder that __" or "small wonder that __" are not considered eventive. They are reductions of "it is no wonder that __", in which the wonder is a thing, not an event. Use .ER.

example.name: both args
example.text: In his wonder at the greatness of this delight he did well to call it 'the key to the Kingdom of heaven'.
example.arg: at the greatness of this delight

example.name: with MNR
example.text: This moment of childish wonder raised the curtain on the drama of his life in Taiwan .

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on wonder-v.02. Corresponds to VNcls marvel-31.3.

example.name: non-eventive-- call .ER. Do not tag.
example.text: No wonder the " stock masters " featured on cable TV usually disappear from view after a brief reign , only to be replaced by equally short - lived successors .
